trans:
ğŸš¨ How can I participate in the pre-sale?
ğŸ‘‰ OPTION 1: Access Shotgun with an account registered using the SAME EMAIL you used to sign up for the GALAXIE CLUB through this link: https://shotgun.live/events/4-minutes-fancon-truth-behind-the-time-in-sao-paulo? ids=805804,806696,806458,806692,806697,806698,806705,806707,806719,806727,806728,806731,806732
If you access the general sale link, you won't be able to see the pre-sale tickets! So save the link above and use it exclusively during the pre-sale. To purchase through the app, you must also click on this link. We will also share this link on our social media, so pay attention to accessing the correct link!
With this option, a Shotgun convenience fee will be charged, and payment can be made by credit card, debit card, or PIX.
If you have any problems placing your order on Shotgun, please contact us at contato@hwstar.com.br.
ğŸ‘‰ OPTION 2: If you are interested in paying by PIX or invoice, you can request your ticket by email. With this option, there will be no Shotgun convenience fee. This modality is only available for those who pay by PIX or invoice and request the ticket by email exclusively during the pre-sale period. To request without a convenience fee, follow the instructions below:
